attribution.message: By Tyler Lin and Adit Bala

areYouSure.message: Are you sure you want to delete the class $CLASS_NAME$?
areYouSure.description: Message shown when deleting a class

succesfulDelete.description: Message shown when succesfully deleting a class

succesfulExport.description: Message shown when succesfully exporting to Google Sheets™

joinedAt.description: Message next to a present student

lastSeen.description: Message shown next to a previously present student

notHere.description: Message shown next to an absent student

firstName.description: Message shown for sorting by first name option

lastName.description: Message shown for sorting by last name option

presentFirst.description: Message shown for sorting by those present option

addedToClass.description: Message shown when adding a student to a class

removeFromClass.description: Message shown when removing a student from a class

succesfullySavedClass.description: Message shown when saving a class

undoSuccess.description: Message shown when undo of an action is succesful

errorClassEmpty.message: Error: The class name cannot be empty.
errorClassEmpty.description: Error shown when class is made without a name

errorChar§.message: Error: The class name cannot contain the character §.
errorChar§.description: Error shown when class is made with §

errorDuplicateName.message: Error: You already have a class with that name.
errorDuplicateName.description: Error shown when class is made with an already existing name

presentTooltip.description: Message shown when hovering over active student icon

previouslyPresentTooltip.description: Message shown when hovering over previously present student icon

notOnListTooltip.description: Message shown when hovering over student not on the list icon

absentTooltip.description: Message shown when hovering over absent student icon

addToClassTooltip.description: Message shown when hovering over add to class icon

removeFromClassTooltip.description: Message shown when hovering over remove from class icon

helpTooltip.description: When you've fallen and you can't get up

errorUserAccess.message: The user did not approve access.
errorUserAccess.description: Error shown when User did not authenthicate access

newInVersion.description: Message shown for what is new in the latest update

YouDonutHaveClasses.message: You don't have any classes! Add a class by clicking the button below.
YouDonutHaveClasses.description: Message shown to encourage a user to make a class

sortLastName.description: Message shown to sort by Last Name

sortFirstName.description: Message shown to sort by First Name

sortPresentFirst.description: Message shown to sort who is Present, but present first

sortPresentLast.description: Message shown to sort who is Present, but absent first

addStudentsToClass.message: Select edit or click the + button next to a name to add students to this class.
addStudentsToClass.description: Message shown to encourage users to add a student

confirmDelete.description: how to confirm a deletion of a class

errorOccured.message: An error occurred. Please try again later.

showAdvanced.message: An error occurred. Please try again later.

errorRefreshAuthToken.message: An error occurred while refreshing your auth token.
errorRefreshAuthToken.description: error while trying to refresh auto token

waitRefreshAuthToken.message: Please wait until tomorrow to refresh your token again.
